In England, in the seven days to 06 April, there were 16,489 new confirmed cases (29.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 March, there were 26,530 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 38% (10,041 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 April is 3,819,149 (6,785.1 cases per 100,000 population).
